Package org.jlinalg.optimise

Interface Summary
Optimiser<RESIDUAL extends IRingElement<?>> The contract for an optimiser.
Target<RESIDUAL extends IRingElement<?>> This interface is to be used in combination with Optimiser.
 

Class Summary
RandomGradientDescent<RESIDUAL extends IRingElement<RESIDUAL>> An implementation of an optimiser: Among the parameters, one is randomly choosen and then this dimension is searched along the gradient with a decreasing step size if the residual does not decreases.
 

Enum Summary
Optimiser.State the states of the optimiser
 

Error Summary
OptimiserError The error to risen if the optimiser encounters problems.
